short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be prepared for the tank. Every time you open a new tab, you will get a question that will prepare you for being on shark tank.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever imagined yourself being on shark tank? I know I have. Being in front of the sharks is a great opportunity for your business if you are prepared for it. Many have been chosen to pitch their businesses and they were not able to answer simple questions about their business. That is why we created shark tank fit. You will be able to keep those questions fresh in your mind so that you could actually work on your business and not just in your business. Every new tab reveals a new question.
